article:
One day a small boy was walking along the street in London. His name was Tom. It was a cold winter day in 1900.  That day  he could have no breakfast  _  lunch. He wanted to buy bread, but he didn't  have  any money.
His father  _ when he was very young. His mother was often very ill, so she could not  look after Tom and his brother, Mike.  Both of them  had to work to help their  _  mother.
He was small but his dream was very big. His wish was  to become a great man in the world of film. So he worked very hard  _  singing and dancing. Then ,a man came to him and asked,"  Will you work  for my film?" "Cetrainly." He answered. And he did his  _  in it. Many people asid,"We have never seen  such an  interesting film."
Thirty years  _  ,this same boy was  _  the most famous people in the world. He made many good films. A lot of people liked  _  .
